text:
• 渲染與BIM建模工具（如Veras、Hypar）：提供自動化建模與可視化，但無法統合多元資料來源。
2.2 理論支持：A Pattern Language 的啟發
• [redacted_name]強調設計模式的上下文適應性與人性化需求，為AI設計應用提供了概念框架。
3. 研究方法
3.1 訪談研究
trans:
• Rendering and BIM modeling tools (such as Veras and Hypar): provide automated modeling and visualization, but cannot integrate multiple data sources.
2.2 Theoretical Support: Inspiration from "A Pattern Language"
• [redacted_name] emphasizes the contextual adaptability and humanistic needs of design patterns, and provides a conceptual framework for AI design applications.
3. Research Methods
3.1 Interview Research
